thread.title: Gordon Ramsay has no time for amateur chefs
thread.title_full: Gordon Ramsay has no time for amateur chefs

title: Gordon Ramsay has no time for amateur chefs
text:
Gordon Ramsay has no time for amateur chefs Gordon Ramsay is a household name.
The British chef, restaurateur and host is known for his incredible talent, no nonsense work ethic and fiery personality. Everyone knows you don't cross Gordon Ramsay, even on Twitter.
Social media learned this the hard way when many users decided to submit their homemade creations for approval from the renown chef. And Ramsay did not hold back.

Burn.
Very few of the submissions were up to Ramsay's standards. Many of them received with a few hilariously snarky comments, some words of wisdom and profanity. In true Ramsay fashion, he proved that there can be too many chefs in the kitchen.
Related: Gordon Ramsay and his dog
